statements: SELECT * FROM employee_grievances WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT grievance_id, grievance_date FROM employee_grievances WHERE grievance_id > 500 ORDER BY grievance_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, grievance_date, grievance_details FROM employee_grievances WHERE employee_id = 200 AND resolution_details IS NULL
SELECT * FROM employee_grievances WHERE grievance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT employee_id, grievance_date, grievance_details, resolution_details FROM employee_grievances WHERE grievance_details LIKE '%harassment%' ORDER BY grievance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_grievances WHERE grievance_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, grievance_date, grievance_details FROM employee_grievances WHERE resolution_details IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_grievances WHERE grievance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT grievance_id, employee_id, grievance_date, grievance_details FROM employee_grievances ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_grievances FROM employee_grievances WHERE resolution_details LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeGrievances;
SELECT grievance_id, employee_id, grievance_details, date_filed FROM EmployeeGrievances;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_details, resolution_date, grievance_id FROM GrievanceResolutions;
SELECT employee_id, grievance_details FROM EmployeeGrievances WHERE date_filed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT grievance_id, resolution_details, resolution_date FROM GrievanceResolutions WHERE resolution_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeGrievances WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT grievance_details, date_filed FROM EmployeeGrievances WHERE grievance_id = 456;
SELECT grievance_id, employee_id, COUNT(grievance_id) AS total_grievances FROM EmployeeGrievances GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT E.employee_id, E.grievance_details, R.resolution_details FROM EmployeeGrievances E INNER JOIN GrievanceResolutions R ON E.grievance_id = R.grievance_id;
SELECT * FROM GrievanceResolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM grievances WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, grievance_type, grievance_description FROM grievances WHERE grievance_type = 'Harassment';
SELECT * FROM resolutions ORDER BY date_resolved DESC;
SELECT id, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE grievance_id = 3;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM grievances WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY date_filed DESC;
SELECT grievance_description FROM grievances WHERE grievance_type = 'Harassment' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT e.name, r.resolution_description FROM employees e JOIN resolutions r ON e.id = r.grievance_id WHERE r.date_resolved BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY r.date_resolved DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_grievances FROM grievances;
SELECT e.department, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM employees e JOIN resolutions r ON e.id = r.grievance_id GROUP BY e.department ORDER BY total_resolutions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT grievance_description FROM Grievances WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, hire_date, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT grievance_id, grievance_description, date_filed FROM Grievances WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY date_filed DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_description, date_resolved FROM Resolutions ORDER BY date_resolved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Resolution WHERE date_resolved >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, description FROM Grievance WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.id WHERE e.id = 5;
SELECT g.description, r.description AS resolution_desc FROM Grievance g JOIN Resolution r ON g.id = r.grievance_id WHERE g.date_filed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, p.title AS position_title FROM Employee e JOIN Position p ON e.position = p.id WHERE e.id IN (1, 3, 5);
